about_seo_title: About Stocknear — Institutional-Grade Data for Every Investor
about_seo_description: Stocknear makes Wall Street data available to everyone. Built by investors, for investors — institutional-grade stock analysis without the institutional price tag.
about_hero_title: Making Wall Street Data Available to Everyone
about_hero_description: We believe every investor deserves the same data, tools, and insights that hedge funds pay thousands for. Stocknear exists to make that a reality.
about_story_paragraph_1: Stocknear started when our founder realized something was broken. The tools retail investors had access to were either outdated, overpriced, or buried in ads and paid promotions. Meanwhile, hedge funds operated with an entirely different set of data.
about_story_paragraph_2: That gap didn't sit right. So we applied rigorous, data-driven methods to build a platform that levels the playing field. No venture capital dictating the roadmap. No advertisers influencing what you see. Just clean, institutional-grade data — accessible to everyone.
about_story_paragraph_3: Today, Stocknear serves thousands of investors who want to make decisions based on data, not emotions. And we're just getting started.
about_values_description: Every decision we make is guided by these principles.
about_value_accuracy_description: We partner with the same data vendors that serve hedge funds. No scraped data. No guesswork. Just clean, verified information you can trust.
about_value_speed_description: Markets move fast. Our platform loads instantly. Every screen, every chart, every data point is optimized so you never miss an opportunity.
about_value_objectivity_description: We show the data. You make the decisions. No hidden agendas, no paid promotions, no "hot picks." Just unbiased information for every stock.
about_value_built_description: We're investors too. Every feature is designed based on what we'd want to see. Your feedback shapes our roadmap — not venture capitalists.
about_data_description: Transparency isn't optional in fintech. Here's how we ensure the data you see is the data you can trust.
about_data_source_1_description: We license data from the same providers that serve Wall Street banks and hedge funds. Every data point traces back to an authoritative source — SEC filings, OPRA feeds, and verified financial databases.
about_data_source_2_description: Our pipeline processes millions of data points daily — from live options flow and dark pool prints to earnings reports and insider transactions. Data reaches you in seconds, not hours.
about_data_source_3_description: Every data feed is continuously monitored for accuracy. When discrepancies are reported, we work directly with our data vendors to verify and correct at the source.
about_diff_1_description: No sponsored stocks. No paid "hot picks." No banner ads cluttering your screen. The data is the product — nothing else competes for your attention.
about_diff_2_description: Our users decide what we build next. Feature requests, bug reports, and feedback from our Discord community directly shape every release.
about_diff_3_description: We publish our data sources, explain our methodology, and keep pricing straightforward. No hidden fees, no surprise charges, no fine print.
about_cta_description: Join thousands of investors who replaced gut feelings with institutional-grade data. Start free and upgrade when you're ready.
